Equipment Actions.Action 1: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 21 Slashing plus 13 Lightning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Whip, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 30ft, Average Damage: 15 Slashing plus 10 Fire, can pull hit target towards the Balor

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Balor makes 2 attacks, one with its longsword and one with its whip
Other Actions.Action 2: Teleport, The Balor magically teleports up to 120ft

Abilities.Ability 1: Death Throes, When the Balor dies, it explodes, dealing an average 70 Fire damage to all creatures near it, destroying its weapons
Abilities.Ability 2: Fire Aura, At the start of its turn, every creature near it takes an average of 10 Fire damage.  Creatures that touch or hit the Balor with melee attacks also take an average of 10 Fire damage
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Resistance: The Balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Weapons, The Balor's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Resistances.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
